masterlist

summary: Harry's daughter surprises him on stage with her mummy!
question: Harry's daughter surprises him on stage with her mummy!
answer:
harry’s baby angel recently learned how to climb up stairs and walk with only little guidance now, and what better platform could his baby girl do that on besides the stairs leading to the stage and the stage himself.

there’s a sudden eruption of yells and he finds him turning his head why when he’s only been drinking water and nothing was happening, following the people in the first row’s sight and see that it lands on his sweet little daughter with you sheepishly trailing behind.

“come on! come on! up you go to daddy!” he almost yells and that made them yell even more, quickly running to her to put his earplugs in her own, his hand gesturing to the stage assistant to get another pair because you’re there too.

h’s baby girl doesn’t exactly hate the attention but she kinda loves it too, harry’s hand on your waist as clare’s voice interrupts for a while to say “no flash photography on my goddaughter please!” and it makes the both of you laugh that it makes your bundle of joy do too.

harry’s proper showing off his family to the crowd and in time, his baby girl raises her hand and giggles to herself.

he coos as he bites his lip, pressing a kiss to her cheek that makes her inaudibly giggle even more.

“love you and your mummy this much that daddy’s not even upset you took his spotlight away.”

masterlist

summary: harry buying matching clothes for his girls :’)
question: harry buying matching clothes for his girls :’)
answer:
“m’kay, so i have seven pieces in mind when i looked at the website, and there are ten when i actually came into their store.”

harry had been searching matching swimsuits for his missus and his baby angel, the pairs of them laid out on the seating are that the staff graciously offered him for his own use, his phone pressed to his ear while you were running errands too for the upcoming getaway he had planned to happen a week from now.

“there’s a peach one, then there’s this frilly patterned type of mesh but s’not see through, then-…”

“wait, ten? love-…”

harry zones out, raising his hand to the cashier and smiles at her before motioning to all the swimsuits laid on the chair and throws a thumbs-up.

“nevermind. bought all ten pairs of them.”

title: No Longer The Same
body:
When she left, she was the town’s sweetheart, but now that is she is back, things are no longer the same.

the dolans are back

Looking through the car’s window it feels as if we never left. All I can see are the same old houses, the same old restaurants and the same old shops. I am all alone in the backseat of the car while…

Read more…

summary: Diana, have you ever thought about Y/N riding Harry’s face? Because I MEAN
question: Diana, have you ever thought about Y/N riding Harry’s face? Because I MEAN
answer:
have i ever?? i think about that all the damn TIME!!!1!!


Y/N gasps lightly, pulling back from Harry’s tight hold onto her waist, hands placing over his hips to balance herself on top of him.

“W-What?” She stutters, her nails digging into the soft skin of his sides.

“What?” He repeats, tilting his head to the side with a playful smile tugging at the corners of his mouth.

She lets out a breathy laugh, nervously chewing on her bottom lip, “Not funny.”

“Wasn’t kidding.” This time his tone is more serious, his palms lowering down and resting over her bum, pushing her closer into him, practically grinding her down over the growing bulge inside his pants.

He leans back, propping his head onto the pillows behind him and looking up at her through hooded eyes. Y/N doesn’t move, but instead glances around the dimly lit room. She feels fine now, but she knows that in the following minutes she’ll be desperate to open a window. Maybe she should have, they always make the same mistake and then he gets all huffy and pouty afterwards because she doesn’t want to cuddle him when they’re both sweaty and out of breath.

Y/N is brought out of her deep thoughts about the heat as soon as he guides her by her hips even further up, now resting right over his butterfly tattoo, the sight making her nervous. “W-wait, wait.” She whispers, placing both hands over his chest to balance herself and stop his  movement.

“C’mere.” He says calmly, his voice comforting the rapid beating of her heart. “Let me have a taste of you, yeah?”

Y/N nods slowly, placing both hands on either side of his shoulders and lowering her head down so she could press a lingering kiss over his lips. This is something she can do, kissing Harry is one of her favorite things after all. His lips are always plushy and wet and his breath feels minty and fresh.

Harry hums in content, pulling back and brushing some of her hair behind her ear. “That’s nice pet,” he purses his lips to suppress a grin, “but I meant a taste of a different part of you.”

Y/N swallows dryly, her elbows beginning to quiver as she’s still holding herself on top of him, squealing when he places both of his hands back on her bum, giving her a light pinch and inching her further up. She hooks her arms around his neck and stops him by digging her calves into his sides. “Harry, wait.” She presses her forehead on top of his, her breathing a lot more erratic compared to his. “I-I don’t know.”

“Why? We’ve done this before, it’s not all that different.” He leans up to brush his lips over hers, giving her bottom one a subtle bite.

“It’s a pretty big difference, Harry.” She puffs out a nervous laugh, shaking her head from side to side.

“I still get to have my head between your legs either way, so I don’t really see the difference.”

Y/N lets out a small noise of surprise at his blunt choice of words, pulling onto the hair at the nape of his neck, which only makes him hum in satisfaction at her way of “scolding” him. Looking down at him and tracing her eyes over his features, she seriously considers his offer. She trails her gaze over from his glowing cheekbones to the tip of his nose and the slight sweat that has already built above his cupid’s bow, ending it over to his slightly parted lips. Looking over his face, she feels a heat creeping up onto her cheeks when she imagines getting to, as bluntly as he put it, sit on it.

“M’not gonna force you into anything you don’t want,” he assures her, resting his index and middle finger underneath her chin, his thumb stroking over her bottom lip, “but I would very much like to have you sit on my face.” He chuckles a little when he sees her eyes widening at his words. “Come on, poppet,” he rests back comfortably onto the pillows, looking up at her as he begins to guide her hips further up, now resting right on top of his chest, “make me happy, yeah?”

Y/N breathes shakily, but nods quickly, the hands she has resting onto his shoulders moving in front of her to grab the wooden headboard, eyes not once leaving his face. She props her knees on each side of his head, his fingertips digging into her thighs and thumbs stroking gently over her skin, trying to ease her nerves. “That’s a good girl.”

Y/N shudders, closing her eyes for a few moments, trying to shake away the nervous feeling inside her body. She can already feel his hot breath resting right over where she aches for him and it makes her legs quiver. Realizing she has yet to take her underwear off, she swallows the lump in her throat before speaking quietly.

“Should I take my-“ Her words get caught in her throat when his fingers slip her panties right to the side and his tongue darts up to teasingly lick a stripe over her slit. “O-Oh!” She gasps loudly.

Her fingers tighten their hold onto the headboard, eyes rolling in the back of her head and mouth parting. She leans forward and almost falls over when his lips latch onto her clit, sucking harshly and making her trash above him. He gets a good grip of her hips to keep her in place and she has to grip the headboard with both hands, feeling like her knuckles might crack from how tight she’s holding on.

Harry lets out a curious hum, enjoying the tangy sweetness she leaves over his tongue and wanting more of it, pushing her down onto him and properly burying his face into her. He breathes harshly through his nose, tongue swirling over her and teasing her entrance. “Sweet little cunt, just for me, innit?”

Y/N whimpers at his vulgar choice of words, leaning her forehead onto her arm, but yelping loudly when he delivers a loud smack to her bum. “Want you to watch.” She nods quickly, tugging her bottom lip between her teeth and watching as he closes his eyes in concentration and goes right back to using his mouth over her in ways that make her soar.  

Her lips curl around his name, whispering it over and over again, mixed with low moans and wet gasps, sounding like straight up music to Harry’s ears. She feels so close quicker than she ever has before, tummy quivering and knees ready to give out at any moment, but she forces to keep herself propped up by gripping tightly onto the wooden frame in  front of her.

The thing that makes her eyes tear up and her lungs hurt from the lack of air though is when he finally dips his tongue inside of her after teasing her entrance for a good minute, his thumb moving in circles over her clit, a broken moan escaping from the back of her throat. “Ba-Harry!” She gasps loudly, crying out when he pulls away to talk.

“Say it.” He demands, his eyes wild and full of lust, pleading with her to say the word resting on her tongue.

Y/N’s never been big on pet names; she loves the ones Harry has for her, always thought they’re really sweet and they make her feel cared for, but she’s always found it a little more difficult to find something fitting for him. She sometimes calls him petal because he’s as soft and beautiful as a petal, and that always gets Harry all mushy and blushy, his cheeks heating up quicker than an oven – that’s why she uses it so rarely.

But the one pet name that drives Harry crazy and makes him want to just ravish her whole, is simple yet it makes his whole body tingle – baby. It’s not necessarily the word, but it’s the way she says it. The way her lips curve around it and the way she’s said it in so many different instances; groaned in the morning when he wouldn’t stop poking her sides playfully, casually in the middle of explaining a show playing on the telly, whispered at night before bed and after a goodnight kiss, and breathy and soft right into his ear when he’s got her legs wrapped around his waist.

She’s still wary about using it though, she’s not like him; to him they come naturally, but she still has to get used to being the one using them. So he asks her, sometimes quite literally begs for her to say that one word that can make his knees weak and his heart swell. He needs for her to say it; he could hear it for the rest of his life on a loop and would be eternally content.

Looking down into his pleading eyes, she breathes out shakily and forces herself to whisper the word he so desperately wants to hear, “Please, baby.” Harry’s eyes close and his brows furrow, Y/N’s throat feeling dry and scratchy.

“Again.” He demands, his thumb picking up once again on what he was doing before, circling her clit with it and making her thighs tense around his head.

“Baby, baby, baby…” She whispers the word over and over, at first lowly, then gradually becoming more high pitched.

Her complete breaking point though is when Harry lets out a sound she can only describe as a growl, replacing his finger with his lips, sucking harshly onto her clit and throwing her completely over the edge, her body shooting forward, arms barely holding her up anymore as she leans onto the headboard, eyes rolling in the back of her head and mouth curling around the same word, but no sound coming out.

Harry greedily laps up everything she has to give him, humming in content, making her flinch away, feeling too sensitive. He takes a hold of one of her thighs and helps her swing it over onto the other side, climbing off of him and laying on her back onto the mattress, chest rising and falling quickly, hair sticking to her cheeks and forehead. He smiles cheekily and presses a chaste kiss to her shoulder.

“Wasn’t all that different after all, see?” She laughs breathily and elbows him lightly, making him lean away and clutch his chest dramatically.

“It was pretty damn different, Harry.” He just grins and comes back to her side, cuddling into her tired body and biting playfully on her ear lobe.

“Whatever you say, baby.”

The way her lips curve around it and the way she’s said it in so many different instances; groaned in the morning when he wouldn’t stop poking her sides playfully, casually in the middle of explaining a show playing on the telly, whispered at night before bed and after a goodnight kiss, and breathy and soft right into his ear when he’s got her legs wrapped around his waist.

She’s still wary about using it though, she’s not like him; to him they come naturally, but she still has to get used to being the one using them. So he asks her, sometimes quite literally begs for her to say that one word that can make his knees weak and his heart swell. He needs for her to say it; he could hear it for the rest of his life on a loop and would be eternally content.

Looking down into his pleading eyes, she breathes out shakily and forces herself to whisper the word he so desperately wants to hear, “Please, baby.” Harry’s eyes close and his brows furrow, Y/N’s throat feeling dry and scratchy.

“Again.” He demands, his thumb picking up once again on what he was doing before, circling her clit with it and making her thighs tense around his head.

“Baby, baby, baby…” She whispers the word over and over, at first lowly, then gradually becoming more high pitched.

Her complete breaking point though is when Harry lets out a sound she can only describe as a growl, replacing his finger with his lips, sucking harshly onto her clit and throwing her completely over the edge, her body shooting forward, arms barely holding her up anymore as she leans onto the headboard, eyes rolling in the back of her head and mouth curling around the same word, but no sound coming out.

He takes a hold of one of her thighs and helps her swing it over onto the other side, climbing off of him and laying on her back onto the mattress, chest rising and falling quickly, hair sticking to her cheeks and forehead. He smiles cheekily and presses a chaste kiss to her shoulder.

“Wasn’t all that different after all, see?” She laughs breathily and elbows him lightly, making him lean away and clutch his chest dramatically.

“It was pretty damn different, Harry.” He just grins and comes back to her side, cuddling into her tired body and biting playfully on her ear lobe.

“Whatever you say, baby.”

Hello and welcome to STYLESLOOKBOOK! This blog is dedicated to clothing and accessories worn by Harry Styles.

summary: On set at a fish and chip shop in Northern London, Harry Styles appears in the new Gucci Tailoring campaign wearing the House’s...
caption:
On set at a fish and chip shop in Northern London, Harry Styles appears in the new Gucci Tailoring campaign wearing the House’s latest suiting designs by Alessandro Michele.

In this shot, Harry is wearing a heritage dark blue bee check jacket, trousers and vest. The suit is paired with a light blue and white striped cotton shirt with white cotton collar and cuffs. A white crystal and silver-toned metal Guccy brooch with a vintage effect heart and flowers motif is pinned to the suit jacket. The look is finished with beige cotton Gucci stamp printed socks and GG velvet strap sandals that have a brown suede trim and feature a velcro strap closure.

Gucci Heritage bee check jacket ($2,400)  
Gucci Tailored bee check pant ($980)
Gucci Bee check formal vest ($1,300)  
Gucci Striped cotton shirt ($680)
Gucci Guccy crystal brooch ($990)
Gucci Cotton socks with Gucci stamp print ($100)
Gucci GG velvet strap sandal ($890) 

See more about the campaign here

blog.name: fromharrystylesdiningtable
blog.title: I’ll Be Coming Right Back Home To You

blog.name: heyitsmybedtime
blog.title: Lucky me: Date w/Harry Styles Oct 10, 2017 & June 5, 2018!

title: Was Louis in Mexico City?
body:
Was Louis in Mexico City?

Oh my God. Louis followed Postmates on Twitter. Postmates is a delivery service company that serves only US cities, AND MEXICO CITY. From what I can tell, they will bring you anything from anywhere. Ramen, fast food, anything underwear from Dillard’s. You order your stuff from an app on the phone, and they get on their bicycles and hustle it over to you. ONLY U.S. CITIES AND MEXICO CITY! LOUIS WAS GETTING SHIT DELIVERED TO HIM IN MEXICO CITY Y'ALL!!!!!!  I got chills!

Bonus - Postmates was started by 3 guys in San Francisco.

blog.name: pendantstyles
blog.title: you bring me home
blog.description:
hannah | vision isn’t 20/20, but harry is!!

+ requests are always open! +

masterlist

summary: dad harry and the missus telling the fam they are pregnant and everyone starts crying.... selp
question: dad harry and the missus telling the fam they are pregnant and everyone starts crying.... selp
answer:
“we’re pregnant.”

the moment harry uttered the words to his family, everyone froze. even the cats. and a minute later, everyone’s crying. missus was beyond happy when they saw her in-laws’ reactions and she couldn’t be happier too when anne sobs out in realization and she had to grip you and harry for support. gemma would tear up and tackle you in a hug but gentle once she realizes her niece or nephew is in your tummy and everyone’s literally ecstatic.

harry looks over his family for a moment and have his eyebrows furrowed, an expectant look on his face as he chuckles

“what? i put the baby in y/n. why don’t i get the tears too? i’ve literally gotten one hug and don’t get me started on-…”

oh god

selp

blog.name: michaelislight
blog.title: Young and beautiful
blog.description:
Hola, soy de Argentina.
Me gusta leer, dormir, escribir y molestar.
Louis y yo tenemos algo en común, los dos estamos profundamente enamorados de Harry.
Real bands save fans, real fans save bands.
El azul y el verde brillan más cuando están juntos. Daría mi felicidad por una relación que ni siquiera es mia.

summary: No quiero pasar el resto de mi vida aquí. Quiero pasar el resto de mi vida contigo.
text: No quiero pasar el resto de mi vida aquí. Quiero pasar el resto de mi vida contigo.

summary: gucci: In a narrative sequence that echoes many famous photographs and scenes from British films, @harrystyles brings his pet...
caption:
gucci: In a narrative sequence that echoes many famous photographs and scenes from British films, @harrystyles brings his pet chicken and dog into the fish and chip shop. He orders and shares it with the animals.
Creative Director: #AlessandroMichele
Photographer: @_glen_luchford
Art Director: @christophersimmonds
